She ran to support sex workers' rights, and to oppose Australian Green Party candidate Kathleen Maltzahn, who supported banning brothels. In 2013, White and Australian Sex Party candidate Zahra Stardust were the first political candidates to film a pornographic scene together. ==Filmography== Year Title Notes 2014 Angela 2015 Angela Loves Women 2015 Angela Loves Men 2015 Angela Loves Threesomes 2015 Angela 2 2016 Angela Loves Gonzo 2016 Angela Loves Women 2 2016 Angela Loves Men 2 2017 Angela Loves Women 3 2017 Angela Loves Threesomes 2 2017 Angela Loves Anal 2017 Angela 3 2017 Angela White Is Titwoman with Elegant Angel 2018 Angela Loves Women 4 2018 Angela Loves Anal 2 2018 Angela by Darkko with Evil Angel 2018 I Am Angela with Evil Angel 2019 Angela Loves Women 5 2019 Angela White: Dark Side with Jules Jordan 2019 Drive with Deeper 2019 Perspective with Adult Time 2021 Angela Loves Threesomes 3 2021 Angela Loves Anal 3 ==Books== * "The Porn Performer".
